pages.text: The $(major)DNA Decryptor/$ uses FE to decrypt $(l:geneticsresequenced:items/dna_helix)DNA Helices/$.$(br2)Every time DNA is decrypted, it will choose a $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes)Gene/$, based on the Entity the Helix came from.$(br2)This Gene is weighted, some Genes have a higher chance than others. The Gene is chosen at the start of the process.
If the Decryptor isn't working and there's a DNA Helix in the output slot, try taking it out. The next Gene may be of a different type, which means it can't stack with the one in the output slot.
